stages.title: Something Feels Off
stages.description: {partner} seems distant lately. Not cold, just... elsewhere. You catch them staring into space more often.
responses: Ask them directly what's going on

stages.title: The Conversation
stages.description: You and {partner} finally talk about what's been brewing. It's not easy, but it's necessary.

stages.title: Crossroads
stages.description: After days of tension and talking, you and {partner} reach a decision point. This could go either way.
responses: Accept that some things need to end
Take a break to figure things out

stages.title: The Offer
stages.description: A major career opportunity lands in your lap. It's exciting but would mean big changes for your life together with {partner}.
responses: Excitedly share the news with them
Think it over before bringing it up

stages.title: The Decision
stages.description: You need to decide whether to take the opportunity. {partner} has thoughts, and so do you.

stages.title: The Aftermath
stages.description: Whatever you decided, life moves forward. Time to see how this plays out.

stages.title: A Misunderstanding
stages.description: Something happened that made {partner} question your intentions. It wasn't what it looked like, but the doubt is there.
responses: Give them space to calm down first
Show them proof of your innocence

stages.title: Rebuilding
stages.description: The air is clearer but trust takes time. {partner} is watching, processing, deciding whether to fully let this go.
responses: Have a deeper conversation about fears
Propose ways to prevent future misunderstandings

stages.title: Resolution
stages.description: Time has passed. The question is whether this made you stronger or left lasting cracks.
responses: Commit to deeper communication going forward

stages.title: The Symptom
stages.description: Something's wrong with your health. It might be nothing, but it needs to be checked out. {partner} is worried.
responses: Try not to worry until you know more
Lean on your partner for support

stages.title: Waiting for Answers
stages.description: Tests are done. Now you wait. {partner} is by your side, but the uncertainty is brutal.
responses: Talk about fears with your partner

stages.title: The Results
stages.description: The results are in. Whatever they say, you and {partner} will face it together.

stages.title: The Possibility
stages.description: The idea of moving somewhere new comes up. A fresh start with {partner}? It's terrifying and exciting.

stages.title: Making It Real
stages.description: The decision is made. Now comes the chaos of actually moving. {partner} and you are in this together.

stages.title: New Home
stages.description: You're here. New place, same love. Time to build a life in this new space with {partner}.
responses: Make the space truly yours together
